document_data.name: Raisa el Catahras
document_data.mainbody: '''Raisa el Catahras''' was wife of [[Atiq el Catahras]], who was the owner of [[The Roving Rune]], a popular inn in [[Teshburl]], in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Raisa and Atiq had a daughter named [[Oma el Catahras|Oma]].
document_data.Activities: Mother and daughter were both [[mage]]s—a rarity in Teshburl—and with Atiq's blessing they practiced their skills in a magically hidden basement level, which the two of them had discovered. There, Raisa taught Oma magic.
document_data.History: Raisa had been trained in secret in the magical arts by her own mother.
